list_translation_mean.translate_mean: cú đánh móc từ dưới lên
đấu thầu rẻ hơn người nào

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: offer goods or services at a lower price than (a competitor).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: these industries have been undercut by more efficient foreign producers
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những ngành công nghiệp này đã bị cắt xén bởi các nhà sản xuất nước ngoài hiệu quả hơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cut or wear away the part below or under (something, especially a cliff).

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the chairman denied his authority was being undercut
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chủ tịch phủ nhận thẩm quyền của mình đang bị undercut

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in sports such as tennis or golf) strike (a ball) with a chopping motion so as to give it backspin.
a space formed by the removal or absence of material from the lower part of something, such as a cliff, a coal seam, or part of a carving in relief.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there may be some bigger fish in the safety of the undercut
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có thể có một số loài cá lớn hơn trong sự an toàn của undercut

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hairstyle in which the hair is shaved or cut very short on the sides or back of the head but left relatively long on top.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she styled her short bob into an edgy undercut
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã tạo kiểu Bob ngắn của mình vào một undercut edgy
